languages.text: "Думаю, это Вортен повинен в твоем помешательстве. Еще на Даргонусе я заметил{mf||а}, что он не тот, кем хочет казаться. Но ты словно ничего не хочешь видеть".

traits.locale_text: "Думаю, это Вортен повинен в твоем помешательстве. Еще на Даргонусе я заметил{mf||а}, что он не тот, кем хочет казаться. Но ты словно ничего не хочешь видеть".

languages.text: "I believe that Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Back on Dargonus, I noticed that he is not who he claims to be. Yet you seem to be unwilling to acknowledge it."
languages.original_text: "Думаю, это Вортен повинен в твоем помешательстве. Еще на Даргонусе я заметил{mf||а}, что он не тот, кем хочет казаться. Но ты словно ничего не хочешь видеть".

traits.locale_text: "I think Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Ever since Dargonus, I had noticed that he's not one for whom he claims to be. But you turn a blind eye to it."
"I think Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Ever since Dargonus, I had noticed that he's not one for whom he claims to be. But you turn a blind eye to it."
"I think Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Ever since Dargonus, I had noticed that he's not one for whom he claims to be. But you turn a blind eye to it."
"I think Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Ever since Dargonus, I had noticed that he's not one for whom he claims to be. But you turn a blind eye to it."
"I believe that Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Back on Dargonus, I noticed that he is not who he claims to be. Yet you seem to be unwilling to acknowledge it."
"I believe that Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Back on Dargonus, I noticed that he is not who he claims to be. Yet you seem to be unwilling to acknowledge it."

languages.text: «Creo que Worten es el responsable de sus delirios. En Dargonus me di cuenta de que no es quien dice ser. Pero usted parece reacio a aceptar la realidad».
languages.original_text: "I believe that Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Back on Dargonus, I noticed that he is not who he claims to be. Yet you seem to be unwilling to acknowledge it."

traits.locale_text: «Creo que Worten es el responsable de sus delirios. Desde lo ocurrido en Dargonus me he dado cuenta de que no es quien dice ser. Pero usted hace la vista gorda».

languages.text: “我相信你这所有的妄想，都是沃尔腾教唆的。早在达戈努斯见面的时候，我就意识到他并不像看起来那样，但却似乎不愿意承认这件事情。”
languages.original_text: "I believe that Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Back on Dargonus, I noticed that he is not who he claims to be. Yet you seem to be unwilling to acknowledge it."

traits.locale_text: “我认为你这所有的妄想，都是沃尔腾教唆的。自从达戈努斯那场见面之后，我就意识到他并不像他看起来那样，但你却对此视而不见。”

languages.text: « Je pense que c'est Worten qui est responsable de vos délires. Sur Dargonus, j'ai remarqué qu'il n'était pas ce qu'il prétendait être, mais vous préférez faire comme si de rien n'était. »
languages.original_text: "I believe that Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Back on Dargonus, I noticed that he is not who he claims to be. Yet you seem to be unwilling to acknowledge it."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que c'est Worten qui est responsable de vos délires. Sur Dargonus, j'ai remarqué qu'il n'était pas ce qu'il prétendait être, mais vous préférez faire comme si de rien n'était. »

languages.text: 「お前の幻想を引き起こした張本人がヴォルテンだ。ダルゴナスに戻って、私はヤツが自分で言うような人物でないことに気がついていた。だが、お前はそれを認めたくないようだな」
languages.original_text: "I believe that Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Back on Dargonus, I noticed that he is not who he claims to be. Yet you seem to be unwilling to acknowledge it."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の幻想を引き起こした張本人がヴォルテンだ。ダルゴナスに戻って、私はヤツが自分で言うような人物でないことに気がついていた。だが、お前はそれを認めたくないようだな」

languages.text: "Ich glaube, dass Worten für Eure Wahnvorstellungen verantwortlich ist. Mir ist auf Dargonus aufgefallen, dass er nicht ist, wer er zu sein vorgibt. Ihr scheint Euch das nicht eingestehen zu wollen."
languages.original_text: "I believe that Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Back on Dargonus, I noticed that he is not who he claims to be. Yet you seem to be unwilling to acknowledge it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, Worten ist für Eure Wahnvorstellungen verantwortlich. Seit Dargonus ist mir aufgefallen, dass er nicht der ist, für den er sich ausgibt. Aber Ihr habt das ignoriert."

languages.text: "Sanrılarının sorumlusunun Worten olduğunu düşünüyorum. Dargonus'tayken iddia ettiği kişi olmadığını fark ettim. Yine de sen, bunu kabullenmeye niyetin yokmuş gibi görünüyordun."
languages.original_text: "I believe that Worten is the one responsible for your delusion. Back on Dargonus, I noticed that he is not who he claims to be. Yet you seem to be unwilling to acknowledge it."
